text: Sri Aurobindo International School is a school in Patiala, India. It was named after Sri Aurobindo, an Indian poet, nationalist and freedom fighter. The school also has an Ashram in which a few orphans live, where they are given all the facilities for free in the name of god. ==References== ==External links== * Sri Aurobindo International School Category:International schools in India Category:High schools and secondary schools in Patiala Category:Schools affiliated with the Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: Sri Aurobindo International School Patiala
